name: DailyBread
0:
”Alexa, ask Daily Bread to read”
”Alexa, ask Daily Bread to sign up for daily emails”
”Alexa, ask Daily Bread to list verses”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily bread
des:
This skill will help you be in the word daily. Sign up for daily emails-- if you have email notifications for an app on your phone, you will be reminded wherever you are. When you ask, Alexa will read you today's verse. If you have the echo show, you can also read along. You can also say "list verses" to list the current week's verses. We take a day off each week to talk with our friends about these verses. 

If you subscribe, you can receive any day's verses via email when you ask.
